page.title: 08RECREATION IN HEDON
page.content: {Hedon}is a small residential town on the outskirts of{Hull.}There are some pleasant walks in the country around{ {Hedon}and{Paull.}There are quite a lot of recreational activities going on in {Hedon}for the children.For example,Brownies,Guides,Cubs and Cadets.There are also a number of activities going on in the Community Centre for adults,for example,visiting theatre and drama groups,along with{ {Hedon}Drama Group,keep fit and dance classes. There are sports clubs like football and cricket.There is also a fishing pond. If you want to go to the theatre or the cinema you must travel into{Hull.} This is because the population of{ {Hedon}is only 4800. Perhaps there is a need for a park or a childrens playground in{Hedon.}
